title: Executive Order 6918-Amendment of Executive Order No. 3206, of December 30, 1919, Creating the Board of Surveys and Maps
content: Executive Order No. 3206, of December 30, 1919, creating the Board of Surveys and Maps, as amended, is hereby further amended by adding the Tennessee Valley Authority to the list of organizations entitled to membership on said Board.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6918-Amendment of Executive Order No. 3206, of December 30, 1919, Creating the Board of Surveys and Maps Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373452
